document_data.caption: The bridge spans the [[Tun River]]
document_data.name: Bridge of Fallen Men
document_data.mainbody: The '''Bridge of Fallen Men''' was on the [[High Road]] between [[Proskur]] and [[Skull Crag]], spanning the [[Tun River]].<ref>Map from [http://wizards.com/DnD/Article.aspx?x=dnd/drback/20080718 Cormyr]
